name: Wc-braintree
body:
This extension allows you to accept payments in WooCommerce via Braintree.
Compatible With WooCommerce 2.1.x or higher ### Install WooCommerce Braintree Payment Gateway 1. unzip the wp-braintree-master.zip file and upload to wp-content/plugins directory. Then activate the plugin through the Plugins section in WordPress
2. Update Braintree Admin Settings
3. On the Woocommerce Menu > Settings > Checkout Tabs > Braintree Payment Gateway, update the fields according to your shop needs.
### Official Website http://www.scriptcombo.com/ ### Donation Do you like this plugin? Please reward it with a little donation. donate to this link http://goo.gl/9f3SlZ ### Support or Contact ping me: support@scriptcombo.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
